article_title: Radiologists Are Seeing A Bigger Role In Health Care

article_metadata.author: Medidata

og.description: The role of radiologists is evolving in healthcare due to technological advancements and regulatory changes associated with the Affordable Care Act and health care reform. As a result, radiologists are redefining their interaction with patients, other physicians and researchers. Diagnostic imaging is a critical component of the health care process, but [...]
